TRANSFER KARIJERE: Reprezentativac Srbije bira – Inter ili Barselona, posao vredan preko 40.000.000 evra!
04 Nov 2019, 16:33 by Marko
Reprezentativac Srbije je u životnoj formi. Prethodnog vikenda njegov Ajntraht iz Frankfurta pobedio je Bajern iz Minhena 5:1, a Filip Kostić je bio jedan od najzaslužnijih za veliki trijumf svog tima.
Kostić je „načeo“ aktuelnog šampiona Nemačke, a upisao je i jednu asistenciju. Nakon toga, trener „bavaraca“ Niko Kovač uz dogovor sa upravom kluba napustio je mesto prvog trenera Bajerna.
Kako prenosi nemački „Bild“ nakon fantastične partije Filipa Kostića odmah su se upravi Ajntrahta javili Barselona i Inter koji žele Srbina u svojim redovima već od januara.
Njegova trenutna cena je 40 miliona evra, ali nema sumnje da će obe ekipe biti spremne da pojačaju ponudu kako bi privolele 27-godišnjeg Kragujevčanina u svoje redove.
Kostić je karijeru započeo u Radničkom. Na leto 2012. godine potpisuje za Groningen za milion i 250.000 evra. Samo dve sezone kasnije kupuje ga Štutgart za šest miliona evropskih novčanica. Nakon toga sledi selidba u Hamburg koji je za njegove usluge izdvojio 14 miliona evra.
Od avgusta 2018. godine je u Ajntrahtu na pozajmici. Čelnici Frankfurta su ovog leta otkupili njegov ugovor za šest miliona evra i smeši im se zaista ogroman profit ukoliko do transfera u Inter ili Barselonu dođe u narednom periodu.
Filip Kostić je za reprezentaciju Srbije do sada odigrao 32 utakmice i postigao dva gola uz sedam upisanih asistencija.

CAREER TRANSFER: Serbia national team chooses - Inter or Barcelona, a job worth over 40,000,000 euros!
04 Nov 2019, 15:33 by Marko
The Serbian national team is in shape. Last weekend his Eintracht Frankfurt beat Bayern Munich 5-1, and Filip Kostic was one of the most deserving of his team's great triumph.
Kostic "started" the current champion of Germany, and has enlisted one assist. After that, the Bavarians coach Niko Kovac left the position of the first coach of Bayern with the agreement with the club management.
According to the German Bild, after the fantastic party of Filip Kostic, the Eintracht administration immediately contacted Barcelona and Inter who want a Serb in their ranks since January.
Its current price is 40m euros, but there is no doubt that both teams will be ready to step up their bid to accommodate the 27-year-old Kragujevac resident.
Kostic started his career in Radnicki. In the summer of 2012 he signed for Groningen for one million and 250,000 euros. Just two seasons later, he is being bought by Stuttgart for six million euro notes. This is followed by a move to Hamburg, which has earmarked € 14 million for his services.
As of August 2018, Eintracht has been on loan. The leaders of Frankfurt bought his contract for six million euros this summer and are reaping a huge profit if they make the transfer to Inter or Barcelona in the coming period.
Filip Kostic has played 32 games for the Serbian national team so far and has scored two goals with seven assists.
